meanings.definition: A finishing stroke; anything that effectually ends or settles
meanings.sent1: The final quietus on the project was the successful presentation.
meanings.sent2: The judge's decision served as the quietus to the long legal battle.
meanings.sent3: The last piece of the puzzle was the quietus that completed the picture.
meanings.sent4: The closing of the deal was the quietus that sealed the partnership.
meanings.sent5: The last note of the song acted as the quietus, bringing the melody to an end.

meanings.definition: A release or discharge from life
meanings.sent1: The peaceful quietus of the elderly man brought comfort to his family.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's quietus on the battlefield was a somber moment.
meanings.sent3: The cat's quietus from its nine lives left it with only one.
meanings.sent4: The quietus of the old tree marked the cycle of life in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The quietus of the setting sun signaled the end of another day.
